entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
